text: Phlyarus is a genus of longhorn beetles of the subfamily Lamiinae,Biolib.cz - Phlyarus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. containing the following species: subgenus Bulbophlyarus * Phlyarus basirufipennis Breuning, 1961 * Phlyarus bulbicollis Breuning, 1951 * Phlyarus thailandensis Breuning & Chujo, 1966 subgenus Phlyarus * Phlyarus basalis Pascoe, 1858 * Phlyarus cristatus Gahan, 1907 * Phlyarus microspinicollis Breuning, 1963 * Phlyarus multicarinipennis Breuning, 1965 * Phlyarus rufoscapus Breuning, 1976 subgenus Tuberophlyarus * Phlyarus tubericollis Breuning, 1967 ==References== Category:Desmiphorini
title: Phlyarus
